root.sql: SELECT c.`Id`, t.`DeviceId`, c.`NAME`, c.`License`, c.`CreateTime` FROM vehicle c INNER JOIN terminal t ON t.`Id` = c.`TerminalId`

sql.description: 查询未下发的指令（雅迅移动终端）

root.sql: SELECT c.`Id`, c.`ParamId`, c.`ParamValue` FROM gpsinstruction c WHERE c.`DeviceId` = ? AND c.`ResponseStatus` = ?
